sketchToImg: photorealistic image, true to geometry of the sketch.
imgToImg: 8k, high resolution, 3d realistic, single object, centered, no background
caption: caption the following image, describe the geometry in depth and style. If no style / colors are present then infer what the style / colors of different regions would be. Give your answer in 150 characters. Speak in third person and do not use 'image of' or 'the picture includes' or 'i see'.
search: In less than 10000 characters, describe the main subject of the image. Be brief and explicit, do not describe anything else other than the main subject of the image.

sd.systemPrompt: 8k, high resolution, 3d realistic, single object, centered, no background
